item.title: Selena Gomez: My Mind & Me
item.description: ​ I think I can help people if I get my hands a little bit dirtier. Sounds so unethical. Your husband is emotionally abusive. Leave him. Okay. -I’m worried about you, kid. -[Jimmy] I’ve been grieving her. [crying] You’ve been numbing. [Paul] You gonna let your grief drown you, or are you gonna face it and come through the other side? -Coin flip? -Get out of here. ​ [Gomez groans, inhales]
